channel.title: CVE Feed for kurudrive -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-2093|2024-04-09T18:59:31.002Z -- kurudrive -- vk%20all%20in%20one%20expansion%20unit
item.description: The VK All in One Expansion Unit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 9.95.0.1 via social meta tags. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view limited password protected content.
